relationship: Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication

comment: "They don't pay (not even a gift card as it was previously noted on this website). I signed a Work for Hire agreement. I can republish with their permission. "

"All USA TODAY College pitches were paid with either a Target or Amazon gift card. All contributors have to pitch again. The exception is the Collegiate Correspondent program; they get a stipend for their work and they are on a semester-long contract for one article a week."
